Text:
To everyone who is throttling their upload speed and expecting only download - please quit it!
There are currently no seeds for this torrent, however there is 1.865 copies of this film available for download already distributed to those of us who have any amount of the torrent.
So please open up your upload speeds so we can all get download as well as upload and a full version instead of waiting around like idiots for idiots to stop being selfish.
Thanks.
